If you want weather which is almost totally predictable then go to South East Asia where the Monsoon generally arrives within the same few days every year.
The weather here is Always unpredictable, that is why we constantly talk about it, driving foreigners to distraction.
Oh, and the weather will be getting steadily warmer, we are moving out of winter and towards summer.
